Typealiases.html#/ViewController.name: ViewController
Typealiases.html#/ViewController.abstract: On watchOS, WKInterfaceController is considered to be a ViewController, that can participate in navigation and routing.

Typealiases.html#/s:7Ariadne14ViewContro.name: ViewController
Typealiases.html#/s:7Ariadne14ViewContro.abstract: On macOS, NSViewController is considered to be a ViewController, that can participate in navigation and routing.

Structs/NonTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne13.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Structs/NonTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne13.abstract: This method is not expected to be called and asserts when it is.

Structs/NonTransition.html.name: NonTransition
Structs/NonTransition.html.abstract: Transition, that should not be performed and asserts if asked to do so. Can be used for routes that do not clearly define a transition, for example instances of ChainableRoute, which may have multiple chainable transitions embedded.

Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.name: isAnimated
Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.abstract: Flag, that shows whether transition should be animated.

Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.name: transitionType
Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.abstract: Type of transition this object is capable of performing.

Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.name: viewFinder
Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.abstract: Object, responsible for finding currently visible view in existing view hierarchy.

Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Protocols/ViewTransition.html#/s:7Ariadn.abstract: Performs transition with provided view, using currently visibleView, and calls completion once transition has been completed.

Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.name: Context
Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.abstract: Argument type, that ViewBuilder needs to build a ViewController.

Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.name: build(with:)
Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.abstract: Builds a View using provided Context or throws an error, if building process was not successful

Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.name: build()
Protocols/ViewBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne11.abstract: Builds a View, that does not require Context, because it’s Context is Void.

Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html#/s:7A.name: Context
Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html#/s:7A.abstract: Argument type, that can be used to update a View.

Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html#/s:7A.name: findUpdatableView(for:)
Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html#/s:7A.abstract: Searches view hierarchy to find View, that can be updated using provided Context.

Protocols/ContextUpdatable.html#/s:7Aria.name: Context
Protocols/ContextUpdatable.html#/s:7Aria.abstract: Argument type, that can be used to update a View.

Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.name: Builder
Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.abstract: Type, responsible for building a view, that is needed for routing.

Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.name: chained(with:context:)
Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.abstract: Chains current route with the next one.

Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.name: chained(with:)
Protocols/Routable.html#/s:7Ariadne8Rout.abstract: Chains current route with the next one.

Protocols/ViewFinder.html#/s:7Ariadne10V.name: currentlyVisibleView(startingFrom:)
Protocols/ViewFinder.html#/s:7Ariadne10V.abstract: Returns currently visible view in view hierarchy.

Protocols/ViewFinder.html.name: ViewFinder
Protocols/ViewFinder.html.abstract: Type, responsible for finding currently visible view in existing view hierarchy.

Protocols/RootViewProvider.html.name: RootViewProvider
Protocols/RootViewProvider.html.abstract: Type that is responsible for providing root view in current view hierarchy.

Protocols/Routable.html.name: Routable
Protocols/Routable.html.abstract: Type, that is capable of performing route from current screen to another one.

Protocols/ContextUpdatable.html.name: ContextUpdatable
Protocols/ContextUpdatable.html.abstract: Type, that can be updated with newly received Context

Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html.name: UpdatableViewFinder
Protocols/UpdatableViewFinder.html.abstract: Object, that searches view hierarchy to find View, that can be updated with provided Context.

Protocols/ViewBuilder.html.name: ViewBuilder
Protocols/ViewBuilder.html.abstract: Type, that is capable of building a ViewController, given Context.

Protocols/ViewTransition.html.name: ViewTransition
Protocols/ViewTransition.html.abstract: Type, that is responsible for making a transition between views.

Extensions/Route.html#/asUpdatingRoute(w.name: asUpdatingRoute(withRootProvider:)
Extensions/Route.html#/asUpdatingRoute(w.abstract: Converts Route to UpdatingRoute given provided RootViewProvider, using CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFinder as a ViewFinder.

Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/embeddedInN.name: embeddedInNavigation(navigationBuilder:)
Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/embeddedInN.abstract: Creates a NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBuilder, embedding current view builder in it.

Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/pushRoute(i.name: pushRoute(isAnimated:)
Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/pushRoute(i.abstract: Creates a route, that uses current builder, creates a view, and pushes it onto current navigation stack.

Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/presentRout.name: presentRoute(isAnimated:)
Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/presentRout.abstract: Creates a route, that uses current builder, creates a view, and presents it on top of currently visible view.

Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/with(_:).name: with(_:)
Extensions/ViewBuilder.html#/with(_:).abstract: Combines current builder with provided transition to create a Route, containing them both.

Enums/TransitionType.html.name: TransitionType
Enums/TransitionType.html.abstract: Value type, that represents action, that ViewTransition object is performing.

Classes/NonBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne10Non.name: build(with:)
Classes/NonBuilder.html#/s:7Ariadne10Non.abstract: This method is not expected to be called and asserts on attempt to call it.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.name: rootProvider
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.abstract: Object responsible for providing root view of interface hierarchy.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.name: findUpdatableView(for:)
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.abstract: Searches view hierarchy to find View, that can be updated using provided Context. Uses CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder object to find currently visible view.

Classes/TabBarEmbeddingBuilder.html#/bui.name: build(with:)
Classes/TabBarEmbeddingBuilder.html#/bui.abstract: Builds UITabBarController from provided array of views, setting them in viewControllers property of UITabBarController.

Classes/SplitViewBuilder.html#/init(mast.name: init(masterBuilder:detailBuilder:)
Classes/SplitViewBuilder.html#/init(mast.abstract: Creates SplitViewBuilder from provided master view and detail view builders.

Classes/SplitViewBuilder.html#/build(wit.name: build(with:)
Classes/SplitViewBuilder.html#/build(wit.abstract: Builds UISplitViewController from provided contexts for master view and detail view.

Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: Builder
Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: ChainableRoute builder is identical to first route builder

Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: tailContext
Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: Context, that will be used to build next View in the chain

Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: init(headRoute:tailRoute:tailContext:)
Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: Creates chain from two routes, by placing them in a headRoute and tailRoute.

Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: perform(withViewFinder:context:completion:)
Classes/ChainableRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: Performs headRoute, and once it completes, follows it with tailRoute, and once that is completed, calls completion closure.

Classes/UpdatingRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne13.name: updatableViewFinder
Classes/UpdatingRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne13.abstract: Object, responsible for finding view to update.

Classes/UpdatingRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne13.name: perform(withViewFinder:context:completion:)
Classes/UpdatingRoute.html#/s:7Ariadne13.abstract: Performs route between views. If updatable view is found, it’s updated with newly received context. If it’s not found, this method calls superclass method and behaves as a Route object.

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC7bu.name: builder
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC7bu.abstract: Object, responsible for building a view, that is needed for routing.

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC10t.name: transition
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC10t.abstract: Object, that is responsible for performing a transition between views

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC24p.name: prepareForHideTransition
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC24p.abstract: Closure, that is called prior to executing .hide transition

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC24p.name: prepareForShowTransition
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC24p.abstract: Closure, that is called prior to executing .show transition

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC26p.name: prepareForCustomTransition
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC26p.abstract: Closure, that is called prior to executing a .custom transition

Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC7bu.name: init(builder:transition:)
Classes/Route.html#/s:7Ariadne5RouteC7bu.abstract: Creates Route with specified builder and transition.

Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/viewFin.name: viewFinder
Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/viewFin.abstract: CUrrently visible view finder. Defaults to nil and is not used in current transition.

Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/window.name: window
Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/window.abstract: UIWindow instance on which transition will be performed.

Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/duratio.name: duration
Classes/RootViewTransition.html#/duratio.abstract: Duration of animated transition. Defaults to 0.3 seconds.

Classes/PresentationTransition.html#/per.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Classes/PresentationTransition.html#/per.abstract: Performs transition by calling present(_:animated:) on visibleView with view argument.

Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.name: Context
Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.abstract: NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBuilder.Context is identical to embedded view Context.

Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.name: build(with:)
Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.abstract: Builds UINavigationController instance with embedded view, which is set in its viewControllers property.

Classes/NavigationEmbeddingBuilder.html#.name: build(with:)
Classes/NavigationEmbeddingBuilder.html#.abstract: Builds UINavigationController from provided array of views, setting them in viewControllers property of UINavigationController.

Classes/PopToRootNavigationTransition.ht.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Classes/PopToRootNavigationTransition.ht.abstract: Performs transition by calling popToRootViewController(animated:) on visibleView navigation controller.

Classes/PopNavigationTransition.html#/pe.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Classes/PopNavigationTransition.html#/pe.abstract: Performs transition by calling popViewController(_:animated:) on visibleView navigation controller.

Classes/PushNavigationTransition.html#/p.name: perform(with:on:completion:)
Classes/PushNavigationTransition.html#/p.abstract: Performs transition by calling pushViewController(_:animated:) on visibleView navigation controller with view argument.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html#.name: currentlyVisibleView(startingFrom:)
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html#.abstract: Searches view hierarhcy for currently visible view. If no visible view was found, root view controller from rootViewProvider is returned.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html#.name: findCurrentlyVisibleView(startingFrom:)
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html#.abstract: Recursively searches view hierarchy for currently visible view.

Classes/BaseTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: viewFinder
Classes/BaseTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: Object responsible for finding currently visible view in view hierarchy.

Classes/BaseTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne1.name: init(finder:isAnimated:)
Classes/BaseTransition.html#/s:7Ariadne1.abstract: Creates animated transition object. If finder argument is nil, Route class uses ViewFinder passed by the Router that performs the route. This is recommended behavior unless you want to customize view searching for this particular transition.

Classes/BaseTransition.html#/animateAlon.name: animateAlongsideTransition(with:isAnimated:completion:)
Classes/BaseTransition.html#/animateAlon.abstract: If isAnimated flag is true, calls visibleView.transitionCoordinator animate(alongsideTransition:) method and calls completion block once transition has been completed. If isAnimated is false, just calls completion block and returns.

Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.name: viewFinder
Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.abstract: Object responsible for finding view on which route should be performed.

Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.name: rootViewProvider
Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.abstract: Object responsible for providing root view of interface hierarchy.

Classes/Router.html#/init(rootViewProvid.name: init(rootViewProvider:)
Classes/Router.html#/init(rootViewProvid.abstract: Creates Router with CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder object set as a ViewFinder instance.

Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.name: init(rootViewProvider:viewFinder:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC1.abstract: Creates Router with specified root view provider and view finder.

Classes/Router.html#/popRoute(isAnimated.name: popRoute(isAnimated:)
Classes/Router.html#/popRoute(isAnimated.abstract: Returns route, that calls popViewController method on currently visible navigation controller. No view is getting built in the process of routing.

Classes/Router.html#/popToRootRoute(isAn.name: popToRootRoute(isAnimated:)
Classes/Router.html#/popToRootRoute(isAn.abstract: Returns route, that calls popToRootViewController method on currently visible navigation controller. No view is getting built in the process of routing.

Classes/Router.html#/dismissRoute(isAnim.name: dismissRoute(isAnimated:)
Classes/Router.html#/dismissRoute(isAnim.abstract: Returns route, that calls dismiss method on currently visible view controller. No view is getting built in the process of routing.

Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC8.name: navigate(to:with:completion:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC8.abstract: Performs navigation to route using provided context and calling completion once routing process is completed.

Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC8.name: navigate(to:completion:)
Classes/Router.html#/s:7Ariadne6RouterC8.abstract: Performs navigation to route and calls completion once routing process is completed.

Classes/Router.html.name: Router
Classes/Router.html.abstract: Object responsible for performing navigation to concrete routes, as well as keeping references to root view provider and view finder.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html.name: CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder.html.abstract: Class, capable of finding currently visible view, using recursive search through UIViewController, UINavigationController and UITabBarController APIs.

Classes/PushNavigationTransition.html.name: PushNavigationTransition
Classes/PushNavigationTransition.html.abstract: Class, that encapsulates UINavigationController.pushViewController(_:animated:) method call as a transition.

Classes/PopNavigationTransition.html.name: PopNavigationTransition
Classes/PopNavigationTransition.html.abstract: Class, that encapsulates UINavigationController.popViewController(_:animated:) method call as a transition.

Classes/PopToRootNavigationTransition.ht.name: PopToRootNavigationTransition
Classes/PopToRootNavigationTransition.ht.abstract: Class, that encapsulates UINavigationController.popToRootViewController(animated:) method call as a transition.

Classes/NavigationEmbeddingBuilder.html.name: NavigationEmbeddingBuilder
Classes/NavigationEmbeddingBuilder.html.abstract: Builder for UINavigationController instance with array of views.

Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.name: NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBuilder
Classes/NavigationSingleViewEmbeddingBui.abstract: Builder for UINavigationController instance with a single embedded view. This builder keeps Context the same as Context of embedded view builder, thus allowing building a combination of those by passing embedded view Context.

Classes/PresentationTransition.html.name: PresentationTransition
Classes/PresentationTransition.html.abstract: Class, that encapsulates UIViewController.present(_:animated:) method call as a transition.

Classes/DismissTransition.html.name: DismissTransition
Classes/DismissTransition.html.abstract: Class, that encapsulates UIViewController.dismiss(animated:) method call as transition

Classes/Route.html.name: Route
Classes/Route.html.abstract: Type, that is responsible for performing routing between views.

Classes/UpdatingRoute.html.name: UpdatingRoute
Classes/UpdatingRoute.html.abstract: Subclass of Route, that allows view to be updated instead of creating a new one to transition to.

Classes/ChainableRoute.html.name: ChainableRoute
Classes/ChainableRoute.html.abstract: Routable type, that can be used to chain multiple Route objects. This is useful, for example, if you want to hide one View, and then immediately after hiding completes, show a different one.

Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.name: CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFinder
Classes/CurrentlyVisibleUpdatableViewFin.abstract: UpdatableViewFinder type that searches current view hierarchy to find view, that can be updated using Context. Uses CurrentlyVisibleViewFinder to search view hierarchy for currently visible view.

Classes.html#/c:@M@Ariadne@objc(cs)NonBu.name: NonBuildableView
Classes.html#/c:@M@Ariadne@objc(cs)NonBu.abstract: View, that should not be built. Can be used for transitions, that hide currently visible view and do not require a new view to be built. For example - PopNavigationTransition, or DismissTransition.

Classes/NonBuilder.html.name: NonBuilder
Classes/NonBuilder.html.abstract: Builder, that is incapable of building a view and asserts when asked to do so. Can be used for transitions, that hide currently visible view and do not require a new view to be built. For example - PopNavigationTransition, or DismissTransition.

Classes/InstanceViewBuilder.html.name: InstanceViewBuilder
Classes/InstanceViewBuilder.html.abstract: Class, that can be used to build a View using provided closure.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
